Athlete Tips & Notes

Jump is a very efficient mode of mobility in BG3 and a 50% increase is a huge boost, particularly when used in conjunction with high Strength and/or Enhance Leap that triples your jump distance. Given this feat also increases an attribute by +1, this is a solid option if it gets you an even number in Strength or Dexterity. This feat works with all forms of Wild Shape.
